languages.text: Сестра Арджента искренне уверовала в слова Паломника, ибо истинные служители Его не всегда носят рясы и золотые аквилы. Если капитан искренне стремится помочь Империуму, пусть даже своими методами, нет ничего зазорного в том, чтобы протянуть руку помощи.

traits.locale_text: Сестра Арджента искренне уверовала в слова Паломника, ибо истинные служители Его не всегда носят рясы и золотые аквиллы. Если капитан искренне стремится помочь Империуму, пусть даже своими методами, нет ничего зазорного в том, чтобы протянуть руку помощи.

languages.text: Sister Argenta sincerely believes the words of the Pilgrim. A cowl or a golden Aquila are no prerequisites for being His true servant. If the captain sincerely wants to help the Imperium, perhaps by his own methods, there is nothing questionable about extending a helping hand.
languages.original_text: Сестра Арджента искренне уверовала в слова Паломника, ибо истинные служители Его не всегда носят рясы и золотые аквилы. Если капитан искренне стремится помочь Империуму, пусть даже своими методами, нет ничего зазорного в том, чтобы протянуть руку помощи.

traits.locale_text: Sister Argenta sincerely believes the words of The Pilgrim. A cowl or a golden Aquila are no prerequisites for being His true servant. If the captain sincerely wants to help the Imperium, perhaps by his own methods, there's nothing questionable about extending a helping hand.

Sister Argenta sincerely believes the words of the Pilgrim. A cowl or a golden Aquila are no prerequisites for being His true servant. If the captain sincerely wants to help the Imperium, perhaps by his own methods, there is nothing questionable about extending a helping hand.

languages.text: 阿洁塔修女真诚地相信着朝圣者的话。她认为，想要成为帝皇真正的仆人，并不需要穿上修士服，也并不需要随身带着金色的双头鹰装饰。如果这位舰长打算用他自己的方式真诚地协助帝国，那对他伸出援助之手并不是什么可疑行为。
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta sincerely believes the words of the Pilgrim. A cowl or a golden Aquila are no prerequisites for being His true servant. If the captain sincerely wants to help the Imperium, perhaps by his own methods, there is nothing questionable about extending a helping hand.

traits.locale_text: 阿洁塔修女真诚地相信着朝圣者的话。她认为，想要成为帝皇真正的仆人，并不需要穿上修士服，也并不需要随身带着金色的双头鹰装饰。如果这位舰长打算用他自己的方式真诚地协助帝国，那对他伸出援助之手并不是什么可疑行为。

languages.text: La hermana Argenta cree firmemente en las palabras del Peregrino. No hacen falta una capucha y un Aquila dorada para servir al Emperador. Si en verdad el capitán quiere ayudar al Imperium, aunque sea por sus propios medios, no tiene nada que objetar a echarle una mano.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta sincerely believes the words of the Pilgrim. A cowl or a golden Aquila are no prerequisites for being His true servant. If the captain sincerely wants to help the Imperium, perhaps by his own methods, there is nothing questionable about extending a helping hand.

traits.locale_text: La hermana Argenta cree firmemente en las palabras del Peregrino. No hacen falta una capucha y un Aquila dorada para servir al Emperador. Si en verdad el capitán quiere ayudar al Imperium, aunque sea por sus propios medios, no tiene nada que objetar a echarle una mano.

languages.text: シスター・アルジェンタは、巡礼者の言葉を心から信じている。カウルや黄金のアクィラは、主の真の従者となるための必須条件ではない。船長が心から帝国を助けたいと願っているのなら、おそらく彼独自の方法になるが、手を差し伸べることに何の疑問も持たない、と述べる。
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta sincerely believes the words of the Pilgrim. A cowl or a golden Aquila are no prerequisites for being His true servant. If the captain sincerely wants to help the Imperium, perhaps by his own methods, there is nothing questionable about extending a helping hand.

traits.locale_text: シスター・アルジェンタは、巡礼者の言葉を心から信じている。カウルや黄金のアクィラは、主の真の従者となるための必須条件ではない。船長が心から帝国を助けたいと願っているのなら、おそらく彼独自の方法になるが、手を差し伸べることに何の疑問も持たない、と述べる。

languages.text: Schwester Argenta glaubt dem Pilger. Eine Kutte oder ein goldener Aquila sind keine Voraussetzung, um ein wahrer Diener des Imperators zu sein. Wenn der Captain dem Imperium aufrichtig helfen will, wenn auch durch seine eigenen Methoden, dann spricht nichts dagegen, ihm eine helfende Hand zu reichen.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta sincerely believes the words of the Pilgrim. A cowl or a golden Aquila are no prerequisites for being His true servant. If the captain sincerely wants to help the Imperium, perhaps by his own methods, there is nothing questionable about extending a helping hand.

traits.locale_text: Schwester Argenta glaubt dem Pilger. Eine Kutte oder ein goldener Aquila sind keine Voraussetzung, um ein wahrer Diener des Imperators zu sein. Wenn der Captain dem Imperium aufrichtig helfen will, wenn auch durch seine eigenen Methoden, dann spricht nichts dagegen, ihm eine helfende Hand zu reichen.

languages.text: Sœur Argenta croit sincèrement les mots du Pèlerin. Nul besoin de capuchon ou d'Aquila d'or pour Le servir avec ferveur. Si le capitaine désire réellement aider l'Imperium à sa manière, il n'y aurait rien de répréhensible à lui prêter main-forte.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta sincerely believes the words of the Pilgrim. A cowl or a golden Aquila are no prerequisites for being His true servant. If the captain sincerely wants to help the Imperium, perhaps by his own methods, there is nothing questionable about extending a helping hand.

traits.locale_text: Sœur Argenta croit sincèrement les mots du Pèlerin. Nul besoin de capuchon ou d'Aquila d'or pour Le servir avec ferveur. Si le capitaine désire réellement aider l'Imperium à sa manière, il n'y aurait rien de répréhensible à lui prêter main-forte.

languages.text: Rahibe Argenta, Hacı'nın sözlerine içtenlikle inanıyor. Bir başlık ya da altın bir Çift Başlı Kartal, O'nun gerçek hizmetkârı olmak için şart değildir. Eğer kaptan, kendi yöntemleriyle de olsa İmparatorluk'a yardım etmek istiyorsa ona uzatılacak yardım elinde sorgulanacak bir şey yoktur.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta sincerely believes the words of the Pilgrim. A cowl or a golden Aquila are no prerequisites for being His true servant. If the captain sincerely wants to help the Imperium, perhaps by his own methods, there is nothing questionable about extending a helping hand.
